katie.set_password: Choose a password for your account
katie.loading_suggested_answer: Suggested answer is loaded for approval ...
katie.k_in_minds_of_people: A lot of knowledge only exists in the minds of people or in other forms that are not directly accessible.
katie.difficult_to_document: People find it difficult to document their knowledge, but they are sharing their knowledge through conversations with other people.
katie.human_in_the_loop: Katie is a knowledge management bot, which learns from human conversations and other sources, continuously improving, self-learning and aligned by keeping humans in the loop.
katie.people_want_answers: Your employees and customers want answers, Katie provides them.
katie.already_has_answers: Question already has answers on the channel
katie.send_report_info: The report for the last {{days}} days will be sent to the following members:
katie.please_consider_providing_your_email: Please consider including your email address if you want a reply or follow-up.
katie.no_answer_in_kb: No answer in Katie's own knowledge base
katie.access_denied: Access denied, please make sure to be signed in and to be authorized!
katie.intro_embeddable_ask: Hi, I am Katie and I am happy to answer your questions. If my answer(s) should not be helpful, then you can forward your question(s) to an expert.
katie.send_an_answer_to_questioner_and_train: Send answer to questioner & train Katie
katie.are_you_sure_to_delete_webhook: Are you sure that you want to delete the webhook '{{ webhook }}'?
katie.are_you_sure_to_delete_alternative_quest: Are you sure that you want to delete the {{ index }}. alternative question
katie.are_you_sure_to_delete_classification: Are you sure that you want to delete the {{ index }}. classification
katie.are_you_sure_to_delete_qna: Are you sure that you want to delete the QnA '{{ question }}'?
katie.once_delete_qna_no_going_back: Once you delete a QnA, there is no going back. Please be certain.
katie.knowledge_base_empty: No answer available, because knowledge base is empty.
katie.no_qnas_imported_yet: No QnAs have been imported yet
katie.urls_associated_with_imported_qnas: URLs of webpages from which QnAs were imported
katie.delete_previously_imported_qnas: Delete previously imported QnAs (for this URL)
katie.add_imap_info: Katie can detect and answer questions in emails. An IMAP configuration allows Katie to access an email account. The 'Match reply-to email' restricts Katie to only process emails in the account, that use this email address as reply-to.
katie.select_search_implementation: Please select a search implementation to reindex all QnAs of this domain
katie.add_faq_instruction: Select a language and add at least one topic, e.g. 'General'
katie.add_user_instruction: Username and email can be the same
katie.add_member_instruction: Either enter the email address of the person you’d like to invite
katie.inform_user_re_moderation: Inform the user who asked the question regarding moderation
katie.answers_must_be_approved: Answers must be approved by a moderator
katie.please_approve: Please approve Katie's suggested answer to the following question
katie.domain_name: Name, e.g. name of your company
katie.add_domain_intro2: Please select whether answers to questions should be public or private by default. This setting can be changed at any time later.
katie.add_domain_intro1: Please enter a name for your domain (knowledge base). Usually this will be (or contain) the name of your company. The name can be changed later at any time.
katie.as_soon_as_possible_and_will_send_you_an: as soon as possible and will send you an email to
katie.handle_your_feedback_with_care: We'll handle your feedback with care.
katie.handle_your_data_with_care: We'll handle your data with care.
katie.questions_which_need_to_be_answered: Questions which need to be answered
katie.question: Question
katie.add_qna_to_faq: Add to FAQ page (only when topic selected)
katie.potential_improvement: potential improvement possible in knowledge worker productivity
katie.please_enter_feedback: We would appreciate your optional feedback
katie.please_enter_email: Please enter your email and we will send you a better answer as soon as possible.
katie.make_hidden_knowledge_accessible: Katie creates and maintains a knowledge pool to unlock previously hidden knowledge and intelligence.
katie.make_hidden_knowledge_accessible_v2: Katie creates and maintains a knowledge pool to unlock previously hidden knowledge and intelligence.
katie.send_to_expert_heading: Get the answer you're looking for
katie.send_to_expert_text: Share your question with our knowledge management team.
katie.send_to_expert_text_2: Share your question with our knowledge management team to get the answer you're looking for.
katie.people_look_for_answers: People look for answers. Ask Katie!
katie.reset_password_notification: Your password has been reset successfully.
katie.forgot_password_notification_sent: Katie sent a notification to your email address. Please check your emails and reset your password.
katie.enter_email: Please enter your email or username
katie.domain_protected: Domain '{{ domain_id }}' is protected, please sign in.
katie.overview_trained_questions_answers_prote: Overview of trained questions/answers is protected, please sign in.
katie.overview_asked_questions_protected: Overview of asked questions is protected, please sign in.
katie.overview_resubmitted_questions_protected: Overview of resubmitted questions is protected, please sign in.
katie.answer_protected: The answer to your question is protected, please sign in.
katie.katie_helps_your_employees_and_customers: Katie helps your employees and customers find the right answers to their questions.
katie.question_answer_bot: Katie is a knowledge management bot, continuously improving, self-learning and trained by humans.
katie.answer_helpful_please_rate: Is this answer helpful? Please rate this answer:
katie.answering_questions_using_ai_and_ni: Katie answers questions using artificial and natural intelligence
katie.title_better_knowledge_transfer_and_rete: Better knowledge transfer and retention with Katie
katie.text_better_knowledge_transfer_and_reten: With Katie’s powerful synergy of artificial and natural intelligence, your team can transfer and retain knowledge more efficiently - no more answering the same questions, no more corporate brain drain, effective workplace collaboration, great support for your customers.
katie.text_effective_knowledge_flow: Poor customer service and bad knowledge sharing inside your organization is harmful. Katie allows information to flow effectively among everyone inside and outside your organization.
katie.text_retain_knowledge: Knowledge loss caused by employee exit is a significant corporate risk. Katie helps your business to prevent the loss of valuable internal knowledge.
katie.text_ease_of_use_1: Searching for answers in stale, disorganised documentation is frustrating. Katie makes finding answers fast, accurate and intuitive.
katie.text_ease_of_use_v2: Searching for answers in stale, disorganised documentation is frustrating. Katie makes finding answers fast, accurate and intuitive.
katie.text_privacy_guaranteed: Katie provides granular access control, which ensures that users only get access to answers they should.
katie.title_synergy: Synergy of artifical and natural intelligence
katie.text_synergy: Artifical intelligence helps humans to be more effective and a continuous feedback loop by humans further improves artifical intelligence.
